name: Rocket Pals (Lunar Lander Remake)
description:
Welcome to the third installment, of Greatest Games of all Time (not trademarked, don't sue me).

Today we're joining our two brothers (sisters? I don't know)-- while they're launched, FROM a Rocket, into SPACE! Will they succeed to STICK THE LANDING? Or will they splat like a sad bowl of Pudding on my lap while I'm making borderline shovelware..

Either way, it's up to you! You're the hero of this story, and whatever you do.. Shapes the outcome of two innocent lives.
